message: Sparks. The screech of metal on metal. Oil sprays out like blood as the knife sinks into Clear's skull. Chips of skin fall to the floor.
Gritting his teeth, Clear digs around with the blade inside his head. Oil drips down his forehead and cheeks.
The sight is horrible... but I can't take my eyes off him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear..."

name: クリアα
message: "What are you..."

name: クリア
message: "Now... it's my turn!"
Clear staggers to his feet, smiling fiercely through the oil covering his face.
He tosses the knife aside and charges Alpha, who is just as shocked by all this as I am.
Suddenly, Alpha is on the defensive as Clear unleashes a flurry of punches.
Clear's assault is frenzied, with no thought to his own safety. Almost like...
Like he's running out of time.
Pieces fall from Clear's body each time his blows land. For an instant, I see him stumble.
If he keeps this up...!
As if responding to my fear, Alpha throws a kick at the staggering Clear.
Clear launches himself backward to avoid the blow.

name: クリアα
message: "...Hah. I'm honestly impressed you came up with something so crazy. Didn't do you much good though."
Clear glares at Alpha, gasping in pain.

name: クリアα
message: "It's pointless. Your body's falling apart. Bet you can't even move now, huh?"

name: クリアα
message: "I'll take my time finishing you off."
Alpha picks up the knife and saunters up to Clear.

name: クリアα
message: "You used this to destroy your hard lock and temporarily set yourself free. Now I'm going to use this very same knife to rob you of that freedom."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh, shit! Let me go! Clear, run! Hurry!"
I struggle desperately to escape Alpha-2's grasp.
But Alpha is already close enough to strike.
Clear... doesn't move.

name: クリアα
message: "Aw, your fake master is worried about you. You gonna let him suffer like that?"

name: クリアα
message: "Giving up? Guess I'll make it quick. You're an older model, but your internals should be about the same. So don't worry. I won't miss."

name: 東江
message: "Over already? ...Bring him."
Toue has lost interest. He turns and heads toward the door at the back of the room.
Alpha-2 follows Toue, dragging me along. He's too strong to resist.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"

name: クリアα
message: "Well, I guess this is goodbye for real."
Alpha raises the knife with a cruel smile.
And still... Clear doesn't move.
Why? Is Alpha right? Have you given up?
Why...
Why won't you move?!

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear...!"

name: クリアα
message: "Goodbye, brother."
Just as Alpha prepares to strike―
Clear spreads his arms and takes a deep breath.
From his lips flows a clear, gentle melody.
Alpha staggers back. The knife drops from his hand.
Alpha-2 has also stopped moving. He lets go of my arm and doubles over, groaning in pain.
I'm free... but I can't move either.
Clear is singing.
His voice is as beautiful as ever, but it's the sight of him that takes my breath away.
His body is in tatters, a miserable sight. It should make me want to avert my eyes, but in that moment... he's just so beautiful, I hardly notice.
Clear's song fills my heart with calm, but at the same time, sadness as well.
